name: AP_CLAIM_IF_DX_PSCA
description:
This table contains the PSCA (Proportional Standard Cost Allocation) assigned to each diagnosis on the claim, taking into


consideration the age and gender of the patient.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PSCA
columns.description: The PSCA (Proportional Standard Cost Allocation) assigned to this diagnosis code taking into consideration the age and gender of the patient.
